price: 18. Le croyant peut-il être assimilé au pervers ? Non, ils ne sont point égaux.
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqan lā yastawūna
